K12D0500_H0467:258a-1: badzra bh'u mi tri tsa ra ni r'a dz'a ka wa n'a ma; bod skad du /
K12D0500_H0467:258a-2: rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po /
K12D0500_H0467:258a-3: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-4: de nas gsang ba'i dbang phyug po //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-5: sh'a ka thub kyis ni rigs khro bo //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-6: phyis kyi rtog pa las rgyal byed //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-7: rtog pa'i bla ma 'di mchog bshad //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-8: lha dang sngags dang sbyor ba yis //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-9: rtog pas rtog pa 'joms pa'i lam //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-10: rtog pa med pa'i rig pa yis //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-11: khro bo'i dbang phyug zhi ba brnyes //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-13: bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa la //
K12D0500_H0467:258a-14: dbyangs yig gsum pas mdzes par byas //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-0: @258b drug pa'i gsum pa blangs byas la //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-1: 'og tu dbyangs kyi gnyis pas brgyan //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-2: de la zla phyed dang thig le //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-3: lnga pa'i bzhi pa nyid dang ni //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-4: drug pa'i gnyis par nyid dang yang /
K12D0500_H0467:258b-5: bzhi pa'i bzhi pa yang de bzhin //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-6: yang ni me yi sa bon dang //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-7: lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-8: gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa yi //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-9: 'og tu me yi sa bon no //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-10: lnga pa'i dang po nyid dang yang; ;gsum pa'i sde pa lnga pa la //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-11: dbyangs yig gsum pas brgyan pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-12: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-13: lag na rdo rje'i snying po'o //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-14: lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa la //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-15: gsum pa'i dang po mthar gzhag pa /
K12D0500_H0467:258b-16: ;'di rnams rig sngags dbang byed pa //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-17: gang+g'a klung bcu'i bye snyed kyi //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-18: sangs rgyas khro bo byang chub sems //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-20: rig sngags rnams ni lha nyid de //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-21: stong dang snying rje 'dres pa yi //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-22: lha 'di snying ga'i sbyor ba ru //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-23: legs par bzhag pa bsam par bya //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-24: lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yi //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-25: sngags 'di bzlas dang bri bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-26: aom n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:258b-27: phat h'um ni p'a dzra ba ra dha ra ba l'am n'i aom/
K12D0500_H0467:258b-28: rig sngags 'bum phrag bzlas pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-29: yi ge re la 'bum phrag dang //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-30: de las lhag pa'i spyor ba yis //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-31: sgrub pa po yi bsam pa ni //
K12D0500_H0467:258b-32: zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dgug dang //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-2: las ni gang gang 'dod pa des //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-3: snying gar sbyor ba rim bzhin bsgrub //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-4: lus gtsang snying rjer ldan pa yis //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-5: rang lus lha dang bla ma la //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-6: phyag sogs bya ba sngon 'gro bas //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-7: rig pa'i khro bo bsgom par bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-8: dang po stong nyid rnam bsams la //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-9: lus can rnams kyi dri ma bkru //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-10: rang gi snying gar dbyangs yig ni //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-11: dang po las byung zla ba la //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-12: h'um yig sngon po rnam par bsgom //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-14: sems can dri ma rnam bsal te //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-15: skur gyur snying po bsdu bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-16: h'um yang rdo rje sngon por gyur //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-17: sngon bzhin spro dang bsdu byas la //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-18: sku mdog sngon po cher 'bar ba //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-19: rab tu dregs pas khros pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-20: ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du ni //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-21: bde bar g-yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-22: brgyad gnyis lon pa'i nyams tshul can //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-23: drag cing khros pa'i ro dang ldan //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-24: brang 'gro brgyad pos sku la brgyan //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-25: zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa /
K12D0500_H0467:259a-26: rang gis rdo rje bsnams pa ni //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-27: bsnun pa'i tshul du 'dzin pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-28: g-yon pa bsdigs pa'i mdzub mo can //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-29: na bza' sngon po sham thabs 'dzin //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-30: spyan mig dmar zhing mche ba gtsigs //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-32: steng du bcings dbus cod pan ldan //
K12D0500_H0467:259a-33: zhal nas ha ha'i gad rgyangs ldan //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-0: khro bo'i bdag po @259b 'jigs par byed //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-2: de 'drar bdag nyid rab bsgoms la //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-3: de nas bdag nyid snyoms 'jug pa //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-4: de yi snying gar nyi ma la //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-5: rang gi chos kyi yi ge las //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-6: khros pas yang yang spros mdzad cing //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-7: de dang lhan cig bsgo bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-8: sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yis //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-9: de bzhin du yang dbang blang zhing //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-10: rdo rje h'um mdzad ting 'dzin gnas //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-11: gdug pa'i sems can 'dzin byed cing //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-13: rims dang gdon dang dug sogs bza'//
K12D0500_H0467:259b-14: rdo rje 'og tu rgyu ba las; rtog pa dang po'o ////
K12D0500_H0467:259b-15: de nas spyan sogs skye mched la //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-16: h'um byung khro bo bsgom par bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-17: sku sogs gsum la rdo rje gsum //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-18: bsgom pa 'di ni dbang byed pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-19: dang po zhi bas zhi bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-20: klu la sogs pa'i gzugs byas la //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-21: rang snying 'od kyis bkug la bstim //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-22: mchod sbyin bya ba snying rjes sbyin //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-23: 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-24: mtha' yas nor rgyas padma dang //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-25: pad chen dung skyong stobs kyi rgyu //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-26: dug rnams snying rje'i sbyor bas sbyangs //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-27: nag po dkar po sngon po dang //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-28: rang gi gnas su sbyar bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-29: yang na zhi ba'i thab khung du //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-30: klu yi sdig pa zhi bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-31: shin tu gnag pa'i rigs de la //
K12D0500_H0467:259b-32: mngar gsum chu yis gso bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-2: gnyis kyi sbyor bas rgyun gcod bya //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-3: khrag dang dug sogs rdzas dag la //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-4: rig pa bzlog pas bsgrubs nas ni //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-5: shin tu khros pa'i khro bo yis //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-6: dgug dang gzhug dang myos bsad dang //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-7: cho gas gdug pa dbang byas la //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-8: bsreg pa la sogs las bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-9: brgyad dang bcu bzhi'i dus kyi tshe //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-10: skya rengs shar dang dmar rengs cha //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-11: nyin mtshan zad pa'i dus kyi tshe //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-12: skra bkrol bcud 'dzag gcer bu ni //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-13: byol song gnas su khrag skyug go /
K12D0500_H0467:260a-14: lus dbus me 'bar bsgrub bya de; ;khro bo'i spu yi bu ga las //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-15: spros pa'i khro bo khros pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-16: mngag gzhug rnams kyis drangs byas nas //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-17: rtog pas rtog pa bza' bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-19: gdug pa 'dir ni bza' bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-20: mang du smras pas ci zhig dgos //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-21: ma bcos pa yi sems can la //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-22: snying rje'i yid can rdo rje sems //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-23: til sogs rdzas dang sngags sbyor gyis //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-24: sdig pa zhi byed sbyin sreg bya //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-25: rig pa'i blo can kun bzang gis //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-26: zho la bsreg bya rgyas pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-27: mi rtag gyur pa'i gdul bya la //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-28: 'dod chags yid can ba de chen gyis //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-29: bdag nyid dgos pa brtan bya'i phyir //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-30: autpal dmar sogs kyis sgrub pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-31: 'dir ni ma rungs sdig ba byed //
K12D0500_H0467:260a-32: gtsor ni sbyangs phyir khro sems kyis //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-0: @260b mngon spyod las ni rgyud kun las //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-2: rig sngags snying rje'i shugs kyis 'gro /
K12D0500_H0467:260b-3: las ngan rgyun gcod bcos ma yin //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-4: las ngan dag pa'i rang bzhin du //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-5: khros pas dmigs par mi 'gyur te //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-6: sbyor ba rnams ni bcos mar 'gyur //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-7: byang chub bcos med 'bang spangs pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-8: rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las /
K12D0500_H0467:260b-10: /de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal po //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-11: sngar ni sprul pa bcu drug pos //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-12: rtog pa bcu phrag dang bzhi yang //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-14: sprul pa brgyad du bsdus pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-15: bdag nyid gcig pu bsgom pa'ang gsungs //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-16: nam mkha'i khams su 'byung bzhi bsam //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-17: ri rab lhun po hr'i yig las //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-20: h'um las byung ba'i khro bo ni //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-21: zhal gcig phyag bzhin bza' sngo //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-22: rdo rje dril bu mda' gzhu 'gengs //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-23: sbrul dang mi sdug mgos brgyan cing //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-24: stag lpags smed dkris 'jigs sel ba //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-25: khro bo rnam rgyal bsgom par bya //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-26: thugs ka'i h'um gi sbyor ba yis //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-27: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs mtshams su //
K12D0500_H0467:260b-28: 'jig rten gsum snang rdo rje dang //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-2: g-yon rnams gdug pa bsdigs pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-3: bdud rtsi 'khyil dang dbyug sngon dang //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-4: mi g-yo ba dang rta mgrin khro //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-5: rdo rje dang ni dbyug pa dang //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-6: ral gri padma g-yas rnams so //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-7: g-yon pa gdug pa bsdigs pa'o //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-8: brgyad kyi dbus na khro bo bdag /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-10: dbyug pa nag sogs pho nya bzhi //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-11: sku mdog mtshan mas brgyan pa khros //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-12: lcags kyu la sogs sgor gnas pa //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-14: gtso bcas rig pa'i khro bo kun //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-15: sgyu ma'i phreng bas do shal byas //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-16: gos sngon can la stag lpags dkris //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-17: gdug pa sel ba'i lam du bsgom //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-18: de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gtso //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-19: khro bo'i mtshan nyid sngags bcas bshad //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-20: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0500_H0467:261a-21: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-22: sangs rgyas gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-23: mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-24: mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-28: rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-29: klu nag po ser la khar thogs pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261a-31: nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-0: sbrul @261b 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-1: sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-4: khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-5: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-8: gsus po che sbrul za ba /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-9: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-10: klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su bcings pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-11: aa la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-12: rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-14: nyi ma phrag pa la khur pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-15: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-16: gad rgyangs chen po rgod pas kun tu 'khrug par byed pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-17: gshin rje'i gzugs can khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-18: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0500_H0467:261b-19: de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung gi
K12D0500_H0467:261b-20: bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod
K12D0500_H0467:261b-22: bho bho pam n'a ga aa dhi pa ta ye /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-23: ai dan n'i l'am ba ra dha ra sha ri ram/
K12D0500_H0467:261b-24: badzra p'a ni hri da yam ya: sa m'a ti
K12D0500_H0467:261b-25: kra ma tha m'a ku lo ta s'a da na
K12D0500_H0467:261b-30: ma h'i pr'apta ha ra ha ra n'a ga n'am tstshinda tstshinda /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-31: n'a ga hri da y'a ni /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-32: bhindha bhindha n'a ga marm'a ni /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-33: bi shiryantu n'a ga sha r'i r'a ni /
K12D0500_H0467:261b-35: n'a ga na ya nam n'i h'um h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:261b-37: n'a ga bi d'a ra n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-0: @262a *// n'a gota s'a da n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-1: n'i lam ba sa n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-2: aa bra ti ha ta ba la par kra m'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-4: kri t'anta r'u b'a ya phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-5: ro sha n'a ya h'um phat; tr'a sa n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-6: kum bh'anda auta s'a da n'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-7: phre ta bi sh'a ce bi n'a sha ka r'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-8: yaksha aa pasm'a ra bi n'a sha ka r'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-11: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-12: n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-13: sarba bighn'an bi n'a sha ka r'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-14: sarba sha tr'um sam brta bi n'a sha ka r'a ya h'um phat/
K12D0500_H0467:262a-15: aom n'i lam ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni r'adzny'a pa ya ti sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-16: de'i chog la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu
K12D0500_H0467:262a-17: la sngags kyis btab te gtor na btang bar 'gyur
K12D0500_H0467:262a-18: ro // klu bzlog par 'dod na smyug shad kyi lcug ma 'am /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-19: bal po se'u 'i lcug mas bya'o; ;yi dvags dang /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-20: brjed byed rnams la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262a-21: rims nad med par bya ba dang /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-22: yi ge 'chus pa la ni skud ba sngon pos bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262a-23: nor 'dod na zhag gcig smyung bar gnas te bog gis bdug na rmi lam du dge ba dang /
K12D0500_H0467:262a-24: mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur la
K12D0500_H0467:262a-25: gser gyi dong tse bdun stong ster bar 'gyur ro;
K12D0500_H0467:262a-26: ;rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o
K12D0500_H0467:262a-27: // sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs kar gyis bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-0: 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar rnying pa'am @262b thal ba'am /
K12D0500_H0467:262b-2: nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa
K12D0500_H0467:262b-3: sngon po la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas ta mgul
K12D0500_H0467:262b-4: du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro; ;byis
K12D0500_H0467:262b-5: pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i
K12D0500_H0467:262b-6: skud pa mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu
K12D0500_H0467:262b-7: 'gyur ro // chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-8: dug la ni rtsa ku shas bya ba par bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-9: bdag bsrung ba la ni yid kyis sam /
K12D0500_H0467:262b-11: gzhan bsrung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-12: las de dag thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum mam; bdun nam /
K12D0500_H0467:262b-15: brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-16: de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-17: rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las /
K12D0500_H0467:262b-18: rtog pa gsum pa'o;; ;;rtog pa 'di dag dbang byed pa //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-19: lag na rdo rje khros pa las //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-21: bran g-yog rnams ni bskul bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-22: aom aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um phat//
K12D0500_H0467:262b-23: 'di ni bka' tsam nges bsgrag cing //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-24: bee yig sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-25: snying ga'i 'od kyis dbang bya zhing //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-26: gu gul dud pas brod byas la //
K12D0500_H0467:262b-27: gser sna chen po seng+ge la zhon pa dang /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-2: pi tsi kunda li rnams la mkho ba sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-3: 'di rnams rta la chibs pa la //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-4: 'od dang ldan zhing me long can //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-5: ras dkar gtsong [?] mas gsal byas la //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-6: gsal snang kun ni bri bar bya //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-7: yang na kun kyang sprul nag chibs //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-8: 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha phyag na bsnams: bskul ba dag
K12D0500_H0467:263a-9: par dbang byas na; ;mngon spyod las kun byed par
K12D0500_H0467:263a-10: 'gyur // drag po dgu dang nyi shu brgyad //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-11: sa gsum khyab pa spros nas ni //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-12: sngags grub stobs kyis bdag bran byed //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-13: dus tshod dus la mchod pa byed //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-14: de nas dbul bas 'jigs pa la //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-16: kun kyang gter rnams mnan pa la //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-19: padma zla dang gter chen la //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-20: dzam las byung ba'i gnod sbyin dgu /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-21: bkug la rang rang gsang sngags kyis //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-22: chu dang bcas pa'i mchod sbyin 'bul //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-23: 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa rnams so //
K12D0500_H0467:263a-24: aom bee shra ba n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-26: aom p'urna bha dra ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-27: aom ma ni bha dr'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-28: aom ku be r'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-29: aom sam pra dzny'a n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-30: aom gu hya stha'a n'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263a-32: aom bi tsi kunda l'i ye sv'ah'a /
K12D0500_H0467:263b-0: de nas yang dag spyod pa'i @263b mchog /
K12D0500_H0467:263b-1: lha yi brtul zhugs dag pa bshad //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-2: dus rnams kun tu dar ras gtsang ma'i gos sngon byin gyis brlab bya zhing //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-3: bram ze'i rigs ltar dri can zas dang 'gro mgyogs sha las ring du 'dug /
K12D0500_H0467:263b-4: smyung bar gnas shing chus bkrus dkar gsum gtsang ma'i zas za zhing //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-5: ngag gi rlung bsngams dad dang snying rjes yid brlan rtag tu brtson par 'jug /
K12D0500_H0467:263b-6: bsam gtan khang pa mdog ni sngo bsgyur ba lci dri zhim chu yis byugs //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-7: dkar dang sngo ba'i me tog bkram la sku gdung bla ma mdun bzhag la //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-8: cho rigs btsun pa'i sgrub pa pos ni gos dkar bgos la ku sha'i stan la 'dug /
K12D0500_H0467:263b-9: snying rjes khros pa'i rig sngags dam pa dag cing mdzes par bzlas pa bya //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-10: ru raksha yi bgrang phreng brgya phyed byin gyis brlags la lag g-yas gzung //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-11: phreng ba'i ril bu re dang lha re sngags re bcas nas snying gar bzung //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-12: rnal 'byor 'di rnams spyad cing 'gro la 'jungs pa'i sems ldan pas //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-13: bdag dang gzhan la phan phyir rtog pa bshad pa byas pa yin //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-14: rdo rje sa 'og tu rgyu ba las /
K12D0500_H0467:263b-16: dbyar kha skyes pa'i rtsva dang nags tshal las byung me mched ltar //
K12D0500_H0467:263b-17: rlung gis grogs byas bsregs nas thal ba'i lhag ma'ang ma lus bzhin //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-0: bskal pa dpag med skyes pa'i @264a *//
K12D0500_H0467:264a-1: rtog pa'i dri ma'i rma rnams la //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-2: bsrung ba dad dang brtson 'grus sngags bzlas sems dam me yis bsreg /
K12D0500_H0467:264a-3: nyi ma'i snying po 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su rigs bzung ste //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-4: skyes pa dang ni bud med dbang po skyon med tshul khrims can //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-5: skye ba snga ma'i lam shugs dag dang bla ma'i lung thob pa //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-6: dad dang snying rje'i sems can gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa des //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-7: rig pa'i khro bo bsgom dang de rjes de ni bzlas 'bad na //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-8: bstod dang mchod mnyes bran g-yog lha min gsang ba brnyas med cing //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-9: chu yi mchod sbyin 'khor lo dag dang gtor ma la brtson zhing //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-10: sbyin sreg rnams kyis lha dang bran g-yog mnyes byas na //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-11: ring por mi thogs sgrub pa po des rtags dang phyag rgya 'byin par 'gyur //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-12: 'dir ni mang du smra mi dgos //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-13: sngar ni rdo rje sa 'og tu //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-14: bshad pa'i mtshan ma ster bar 'gyur //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-15: zangs lcags bla ma'i gnang bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-16: lus sogs rig pa'i dbang bskur nas //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-17: me dang rlung sogs 'byung ba dang //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-18: nad dang gdon dang byad rnams dang //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-19: bdud kyis klags ni rnyed mi 'gyur //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-20: me lce phreng ba'i rtog pa las //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-21: bshad pa'i 'chi ba'i sbyor byung na //
K12D0500_H0467:264a-23: smon lam lam sna la brten nas //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-2: yang na srid pa bar ma dor //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-3: sngags kyi rnam shes gzi bskyed nas //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-6: tha ma'ang lam la brten nas ni //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-7: rang 'dod dam pa'i lus rnyed nas //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-8: snga ma lam sel de 'og tu //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-9: dngos grub la ni rnam par gnas //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-10: lha dang sngags sogs rtogs pa des //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-11: rtog pa dman pa mnan pa yin //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-12: nam mkha' lta bur rtog med la //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-13: 'jig rten ngor ni rtog pas sprul //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-14: gdul bya sdang sogs sems 'khrugs la //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-15: nga ni snying rjes sdang bar mdzad //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-16: khro sogs bsal du med gyur na //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-17: khro bor da ni ci phyir 'gyur //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-19: de phyir rig sngags sbyor ba rnams //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-20: rgyud kun du ni gsungs pa yin //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-21: 'tshe ba bcom nas dag pa ni //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-22: sems dag pa ni bde ba yin //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-23: gdug pa'i sbyor ba phrogs pas na //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-24: bde bar byang chub lam brten la //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-25: rdo rje sku nyid 'gyur med la //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-26: bdag gi rig pa'i ye shes de //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-28: ji ltar shel ni dzambu ka'i //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-29: me tog gis ni gzhan du snang //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-30: de bzhin rtog med rig pa yang //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-31: khro bo'i dbang phyug 'dir snang nas //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-32: ji ltar 'dul gyur sprul pa yis //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-33: rgyun mi 'chad par khro bor snang //
K12D0500_H0467:264b-34: snying rje med na 'bras bu nyams //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-3: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sgrib pa rnams //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-4: byang chub sems kyis ring du spang //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-6: brtan dang g-yo ba'i sgrib pa rnams //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-7: blo mnyam dus na gnyen po dang //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-8: mi mthun nam mkha' ltar yangs pa //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-10: ji sring rtog pa'i dri ma yod //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-11: de srid 'bad de rig pa bsgom //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-12: sems sbyong snga ma rig pa yis //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-13: rgyud nyid du ni 'dod pa yin //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-14: gang la sems ni dri med pa //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-15: rtog pa'i dri mas nag por byas //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-16: de la spang ba'i blo med pa //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-17: rtog pa'i blo can 'khor ba yin //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-18: de phyir sh'aky'i rigs can rnams sa 'og tu rgyu
K12D0500_H0467:265a-19: ba'i klu'i rtog pa la sogs pa tshar gcod ba'i
K12D0500_H0467:265a-20: phyir sbyor ba rnams la gus par bya'o //
K12D0500_H0467:265a-21: rdo rje sa gsum du rgyu ba las /
K12D0500_H0467:265a-22: rtog pa lnga pa rdzogs so ////
K12D0500_H0467:265a-23: dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag khri srong lde btsan gyi bka' khrims su /
K12D0500_H0467:265a-24: dpal dpe med lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang
K12D0500_H0467:265a-25: du rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku ma ra badzra
